about.title: About Us
about.intro: Alnaqib Fragrances offers luxury imitation perfumes that perfectly capture the essence of the originals. We believe everyone deserves to enjoy premium scents at accessible prices.
about.missionText: To bring you high-quality, long-lasting fragrances in multiple sizes (35ml, 55ml, 110ml) to match every need. We deliver across Egypt with care.
about.storyText: Born from a passion for fine perfumery, Alnaqib carefully crafts each scent to mirror the originals you love. Your memory is a fragrance—and we're here to make it last.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out for orders, questions, or support.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.intro: At Alnaqib Fragrances we want you to be satisfied with your purchase.
refundPolicy.eligibilityText: Refunds or exchanges may be considered for unopened, unused products within 7 days of delivery. The item must be in original packaging. Contact us with your order details to request a refund.
refundPolicy.processText: Once we receive and inspect the product, we will notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund. If approved, your refund will be processed within 7–10 business days to your original payment method.
refundPolicy.deliveryText: If you receive a damaged or incorrect item, please contact us immediately with photos. We will arrange a replacement or full refund at no extra cost.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Alnaqib Fragrances respects your privacy. This policy describes how we collect and use your information.
privacyPolicy.collectText: When you place an order we collect: name (if provided), delivery address, governorate, mobile number, and order details. We do not store payment card details; payments are processed securely by Paymob.
privacyPolicy.useText: We use your information only to process orders, arrange delivery, and contact you about your order. We do not sell or share your data with third parties for marketing.
privacyPolicy.contactText: For privacy-related questions, contact us via the Contact Us page.
